Description.Text: Uniquely in the heart of Knightsbridge, Kensington and Chelsea, The Montana offers a blend of Victorian grandeur and contemporary luxury. Reside and dine in sumptuous comfort in one of the worlds most exclusive and fashionable neighborhoods. The design and decor upholds the traditional character of the building giving the customer a feeling of accustomed hospitality. The have had commendable appraises acquiring to the standards of the hotel design and decor, from unique wood furnishings to a spectacular display of crystal chandeliers, and granite decor when being welcomed to the hotel. All rooms have their own character to ones liking, whether being large and spacious for the family travellers or being warm and cosy for the single traveller. The bathrooms have been fitted unique marble tiling which give it just that special touch when wanting to unwind and relax. Luxury and comfort will await you in each of the 55 en-suite guest bedrooms.

The Montana Hotel provides a spectacular blend of Victorian grandeur and contemporary luxury providing sumptuous comfort in one of the worlds most exclusive and fashionable neighborhoods which is situated in a quiet residential quarter of Royal Borough of Kensington and Chelsea. Located at the heart of Kensington and Chelsea, the Montana is a brisk walk away from beautiful expanses of Kensington Gardens, the elegant stores of Knightsbridge, Kensington and Chelsea. The neighborhood is home to the likes of many celebrities and social faces. World renowned restaurants are located around the area serving you the perfect cuisine. The Montana is also close to the major exhibition centre of Earls Court and Olympia, The Royal Albert Hall and the famous Science and Natural History Museum, which are all in walking distance. Just a walk away is Gloucester Road underground station, which provides a direct link to Heathrow airport, Gatwick airport (via Victoria).

DOUBLE - ROOM - Double Room offers one double bed with basic amenities. All rooms have their own character to ones liking, whether being large and spacious for the family travellers or being warm and cosy for the single traveller. The bathrooms have been fitted unique marble tiling which give it just that special touch when wanting to unwind and relax.

All rooms have their own character to ones liking, whether being large and spacious for the family travellers or being warm and cosy for the single traveller. The bathrooms have been fitted unique marble tiling which give it just that special touch when wanting to unwind and relax.
TRIPLE - ROOM - Triple Room offers three twin beds with basic amenities. All rooms have their own character to ones liking, whether being large and spacious for the family travellers or being warm and cosy for the single traveller. The bathrooms have been fitted unique marble tiling which give it just that special touch when wanting to unwind and relax.
QUAD - ROOM - Quad Room offers two double beds with basic amenities. All rooms have their own character to ones liking, whether being large and spacious for the family travellers or being warm and cosy for the single traveller. The bathrooms have been fitted unique marble tiling which give it just that special touch when wanting to unwind and relax.
